pullrequest.title: Add OSRF repository to install pre-compiled pkgs

content.raw:
> That's a good point. Do we need to worry about the ign-transport version though?

You found a bug: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/316/use-ignition-transport2-in-gazebo8-and/diff

> It would be nice to remove them from here if building them from source is not necessary. 

I think that it is necessary only temporary at some points of our development when we use a feature present in one of our dependencies that has not yet being released. It happends very few times lately. @thomio could you please remove the instructions here?

> On the other hand, we might need to add ign-msgs.

Ummm ... https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/new?source=default_to_gazebo_version_8&t=1#diff
content.html:
That's a good point. Do we need to worry about the ign-transport version though?

You found a bug: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/316/use-ignition-transport2-in-gazebo8-and/diff

It would be nice to remove them from here if building them from source is not necessary.

I think that it is necessary only temporary at some points of our development when we use a feature present in one of our dependencies that has not yet being released. It happends very few times lately. @thomio could you please remove the instructions here?

On the other hand, we might need to add ign-msgs.

Ummm ... https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/new?source=default_to_gazebo_version_8&t=1#diff
